analyzed: mausalam parva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_16.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
mahīm mahībhṛtām dhurye dharmarāje praśāsati

original: ṣaḍviṃśe 'bde mahābhāgā dvārakāṃ munayo yayuḥ // Bhmj_16.2 //
analyzed: ṣaḍviṃśe bde mahābhāgāḥ dvārakām munayaḥ yayuḥ
tān dṛṣṭvā kauśika mukhān praharṣat mada viplutāḥ
sāmbam kṛtvā vadhū veśam papracchuḥ vṛṣṇi puṃgavāḥ

original: api putraḥ sutā vāsyā bhaviṣyati munīśvarāḥ /
analyzed: api putraḥ sutā vā asyāḥ bhaviṣyati muni īśvarāḥ
tat śrutvā te vadan asyāḥ kula mṛtyuḥ bhaviṣyati
musalam brahmadaṇḍa ākhyam iti uktvā adarśanam yayuḥ
lauham sūta musalam vajra saṃhatam
tad āhvakaḥ bhayāt piṣṭvā tūrṇam tatyāja sāgare
sarvajñaḥ jñāta vṛttāntaḥ vṛṣṇi kṣayam upasthitam
vijñāya kaiṭabhārātiḥ tīrtha yātrā rasāt yayau
caṇḍāṃśu maṇḍala uccaṇḍam tatas cakram suradviṣaḥ
rathaḥ dhvajaḥ ca sauvarṇaḥ sahasā antaradhīyata
atha mārjāra vicchāye kabandha āvṛta maṇḍale
sūrye vighaṭṭita aśeṣa diś taṭe vāti mārute

original: muṇḍo viṭaṅkavadano yādavānāṃ gṛhe gṛhe // Bhmj_16.9 //
analyzed: muṇḍaḥ viṭaṅka vadanaḥ yādavānām gṛhe gṛhe
saṃdarśya vadanam prāyāt vācā anviṣṭaḥ pi adṛśyata
cītkāra puruṣaḥ śabdaḥ śārikānām gṛheṣu abhūt
gṛdhra gomāyu nādena rājamārga aupyapūryata
viparītā prasūtiḥ ca paśūnām abhavat tadā
kośeṣu kanaka ābandhe ratnāni svayam asphuṭan
teṣu ghora nimitteṣu jāteṣu api a viśaṅkitāḥ

original: babhūvurvṛṣṇayo bhānti na hi nāśeṣu buddhayaḥ /
analyzed: babhūvuḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ bhānti na hi nāśeṣu buddhayaḥ
prabhāsam atha saṃprāpte kṛṣṇe yādava vṛṣṇayaḥ
tam eva deśam abhyetya cakrire vipula utsavam

original: udyāneṣu vicitreṣu vijahnustatra te sukham // Bhmj_16.14 //
analyzed: udyāneṣu vicitreṣu vijahnuḥ tatra te sukham
gīta nṛtya rasa āsaktāḥ kalitāḥ kāla cakṣuṣā
āpāna keli saṃsakte tatas vṛṣṇi kule
vivāde yuddha saṃbaddhaḥ śaineya kṛtavarmaṇoḥ

original: hārdikyaṃ sātyākiḥ prāha suptahā sauptiko bhavān // Bhmj_16.16 //
analyzed: hārdikyam sātyākiḥ prāha supta hā sauptikaḥ bhavān

original: sa tamūce tvayā prāyagato bhūriśravā hataḥ /
analyzed: sa tam ūce tvayā prāya gataḥ bhūriśravāḥ hataḥ
evam vivādāt saṃgrāmaḥ teṣām āsīt su dāruṇaḥ
prāk tasmāt vajra musalāt prajātaiḥ vallarī cayaiḥ
tṛṇam api abhavat tatra brahmadaṇḍa mada utkaṭam
kṣayāya musalī bhūtam sahasā andhaka vṛṣṇiṣu
yā bhūt āpāna bhūḥ teṣām lalanā nayana utsavaḥ
sā eva mṛtyoḥ abhūt hora saṃhāra āhāra maṇḍapaḥ

original: sāmbe gade cārudoṣṇi pradyumne kṛtavarmaṇi // Bhmj_16.20 //
analyzed: sāmbe gade cāru doṣṇi pradyumne kṛtavarmaṇi

original: aniruddhe ca śaineye nihate paśyato hareḥ /
analyzed: aniruddhe ca śaineye nihate paśyataḥ hareḥ

original: vṛtte vṛṣṇikṣaye ghore strīśeṣā yādave kule // Bhmj_16.21 //
analyzed: vṛtte vṛṣṇi kṣaye ghore strī śeṣā yādave kule
dvārakā praruroda iva chinna hāra aśru nirjharaiḥ

original: tataḥ śaurirhaladharaṃ draṣṭuṃ duḥkhākulo vrajan // Bhmj_16.22 //
analyzed: tatas śauriḥ haladharam draṣṭum duḥkha ākulaḥ vrajan
dārukam tat kathayitum prāhiṇot savyasācine
yoṣitām dastu rakṣāyai babhrum ādāya keśavaḥ
gatvā janakam āmantrya rauhiṇeyam upāyayau
athā apaśyat mukhāt tasya niḥsṛtam madhusūdanaḥ
sahasra śīrṣam bhujagam śvetam śveta acala upamam
vāsuki pramukhaiḥ nāgaiḥ atha pratyudyataiḥ saha
dṛṣṭvā arṇavam praviṣṭam tam varuṇena arcitam punar

original: gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na śuśoca janārdanaḥ // Bhmj_16.26 //
analyzed: gati jñaḥ sarva bhūtānām na śuśoca janārdanaḥ
bhave hi abhāva sadbhāve bhāvānām sthira tā kutas
ananta dhāmni milite balabhadre sa kānane
praviśya yogī suṣvāpa nibaddha prāṇa dhāraṇaḥ

original: taṃ svajyotiṣi saṃsaktaṃ lubdhako mṛgaśaṅkayā // Bhmj_16.28 //
analyzed: tam sva jyotiṣi saṃsaktam lubdhakaḥ mṛga śaṅkayā
jaghāna niśita agreṇa śareṇa caraṇa udare
kṛṣṇa śāra dhiyā kṛṣṇaḥ lubdhakena iṣuṇā hataḥ
nārāyaṇa ākhyam aviśat param dhāma sanātanam
sura siddha ṛṣi gandharvaiḥ pūjyamāne saha śriyā

original: viṣṇuṃ praviṣṭe govinde babhūva kṣubhitaṃ jagat /
analyzed: viṣṇum praviṣṭe govinde babhūva kṣubhitam jagat
atrā antare dārukena kathite yādava kṣaye

original: śokaṃ trāsaṃ ca dainyaṃ ca bhejire pāṇḍavāḥ param /
analyzed: śokam trāsam ca dainyam ca bhejire pāṇḍavāḥ param
tatas yudhiṣṭhira girā dvārakām śvetavāhanaḥ
dārukena eva sahitaḥ prayayau śoka mūrcchitaḥ
sa prāpa yādava purīm apadmām iva padminīm
vṛṣṇi siṃhaiḥ virahitāḥ guhām haimavatīm iva
kaṣṭaiḥ ariṣṭa nicayaiḥ spṛṣṭām duḥkhāt vilokya tām
draṣṭum viveśa śoka ārtam janakam kaṃsa vidviṣaḥ
tāra pralāpa mukharaiḥ vṛtam vṛṣṇi vadhū janaiḥ
ṣoḍaśa strī sahasrāṇi kalatram kamalāpateḥ
saubhadra janakaḥ dṛṣṭvā mumoha bhaya vihvalam
śayānam bhuvi pārthaḥ u pi vasudevam pralāpinam
vilokya śoka vivaśaḥ vajra bhinnaḥ iva apatat

original: kva rāmaḥ kva ca govindaḥ kva pradyumnaḥ kva sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: kva rāmaḥ kva ca govindaḥ kva pradyumnaḥ kva sātyakiḥ
aho vidheḥ durantā iyam śaktiḥ iti arjunaḥ vadat
aviśrāntam abhūt yatra śravaṇa ānanda nirjharaiḥ
tatra eva vṛṣṇi nārīṇām śṛṇvan ārodana dhvanim
niśām nināya bībhatsuḥ nirapāya mayīm śriyam

original: tataḥ prātaḥ priyasuto vasudevaḥ priyāṃ tanum /
analyzed: tatas prātar priya sutaḥ vasudevaḥ priyām tanum
tatyāja devakī mukhyaiḥ anuyātaḥ vadhū janaiḥ
tatas sāttvata mukhyānām sarveṣām śoka vihvalaḥ

original: pārthaḥ śarīraṃ saṃskṛtya cakāra salilakriyām // Bhmj_16.42 //
analyzed: pārthaḥ śarīram saṃskṛtya cakāra salilakriyām
vajra abhidhānam kṛṣṇasya pautram kuntī sutaḥ tatas
ādāya vṛṣṇi kāntāḥ ca pratasthe dāruka anugaḥ
atha dvāravatīm sphāra taraṅga bhuja maṇḍalaiḥ
śaṅkha aṭṭahāsa vikaṭaḥ jahāra makarākaraḥ
hate vṛṣṇi pure kṣipram ratna lobhāt iva abdhinā
puruṣa anugatam sarvam iti ūce duḥkhitaḥ janaḥ
kalatram vṛṣṇi siṃhānām ādāya śvetavāhanaḥ
indraprastham vrajan prāpa durgamām vikaṭa aṭavīm
dasyavaḥ tatra gopālāḥ balinaḥ paśu jīvinaḥ
a dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ svar yoṣit subhagāḥ sāttvata aṅganāḥ
taḍit tarala ratna aṃśu puñjarita ambarāḥ
vilokya lobha vaśa gāḥ hartum abhyudyayuḥ balāt
gopān āpatitān dṛṣṭā tān ugra laguḍa āyudhān
gāṇḍīvadhanvā gāṇḍīpam adhijyam akarot krudhā
kāla śakti hatasya api tasya api kṣapita dviṣaḥ
na śaktiḥ abhavat kācid kṣīṇa iṣoḥ jyā vikarṣaṇe
cāpa yaṣṭiḥ an āyattā tasya abhūt ati duḥkha gā

original: vṛddhasyeva daridrasya taruṇī rūpiṇī vadhūḥ // Bhmj_16.51 //
analyzed: vṛddhasya iva daridrasya taruṇī rūpiṇī vadhūḥ
tasya kopa agni taptasya vṛthā bhrū bhaṅga kāriṇaḥ
bhṛtyāḥ iva avinītasya babhūvuḥ avaśāḥ śarāḥ

original: te divyāstragaṇāḥ kvāpi jagmurutsṛjya taṃ mṛdhe /
analyzed: te divya astra gaṇāḥ kvāpi jagmuḥ utsṛjya tam mṛdhe
guṇa saṅgām an ādṛtya dhūrtāḥ mitram iva adhanam
sa niḥśaśvāsa vipulaiḥ mārgaṇaiḥ parivarjitaḥ
kṣīṇa kośaḥ iva tyāgī vailakṣya vinata ānanaḥ
tatas niṣpratibhe tatra pārthe sarva āyudha kṣayāt
vṛṣṇi paura aṅganāḥ jahruḥ nirvivekāḥ vanecarāḥ
na tu pradhāna nārīṣu teṣām āsīt pragalbha tā
anarhasya mahārheṣu nīcasya ojasvi tā katham

original: taiḥ prasahya hṛte straiṇe bhagnamāno dhanaṃjayaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ prasahya hṛte straiṇe bhagna mānaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
pratasthe nija dos daṇḍe sa asūyāḥ pātayan dṛśaḥ
aho balavatī devī saṃsāre smin anitya tā
aho niḥsāra paryantā bhāvānām prabhaviṣṇu tā
aho sarva kaṣaḥ kālaḥ citra pākam aho jagat
vijite vijayaḥ gopaiḥ duḥkhāt iti avadat janaḥ
dhik anitya vilāsasya vibhrama bhrānti kāriṇaḥ
dhātuḥ adbhuta nirmāṇa vinoda viśarāru tām
ākhaṇḍala prabhṛtayaḥ khāṇḍave yena khaṇḍitāḥ

original: kairāte tripurārātiḥ samare yena toṣitaḥ // Bhmj_16.61 //
analyzed: kairāte tripurārātiḥ samare yena toṣitaḥ

original: jitvā tamapi gopālā varākāḥ suhṛdaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: jitvā tam api gopālāḥ varākāḥ suhṛdam hareḥ
jahruḥ viṣṇu kalatrāṇi dhik kālasya duranta tām
revatīm rukmiṇīm satyabhāmām jāmbavatīm tathā

original: vajraṃ pautraṃ ca kaṃsāreranyāśca yaduyoṣitaḥ // Bhmj_16.63 //
analyzed: vajram pautram ca kaṃsāreḥ anyāḥ ca yadu yoṣitaḥ
ādāya phalguṇaḥ śocan indraprastham samāviśat
sa bāṣpam paura saṃghātaiḥ abhitas parivāritaḥ

original: rājye nidhāya tatraiva vajraṃ yāte dhanaṃjaye /
analyzed: rājye nidhāya tatra eva vajram yāte dhanaṃjaye

original: satyabhāmānugā devyaḥ pāvakaṃ viviśuḥ śucā // Bhmj_16.65 //
analyzed: satyabhāmā anugāḥ devyaḥ pāvakam viviśuḥ śucā
vrajan vṛṣṇi viyoga ārtaḥ kirīṭi hastināpuram

original: parāvarajñaṃ bhāvānāṃ vane vyāsaṃ vyalokayat // Bhmj_16.66 //
analyzed: parāvara jñam bhāvānām vane vyāsam vyalokayat
duḥkhāt nyavedayat tasmai ghoram vṛṣṇi kula kṣayam
ātmanaḥ ca ātta cāpasya gopaiḥ pathi parābhavam
tam abravīt jñāna nidhiḥ muniḥ āśvāsya mūrcchitam
putra kāla vilāsānām sarvam etat vijṛmbhitam
matiḥ vibhūtayaḥ bhogāḥ prabhāvāḥ śaktayaḥ guṇāḥ
sarvathā kāla kalayā nīyate smṛtiśeṣa tām
dhruvam sarva parityāge na kuryuḥ munayaḥ matim
avasāna eka virasā yadi na syāt bhava sthitiḥ
iti uktaḥ muninā pārthaḥ prayayau hastināpuram
prabhāvam vṛṣṇi siṃhasya kalayan bhṛśa vihvalaḥ
iti śrī kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām mausalam parva
